segments.text: I see a young boy, balancing precariously on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His goal is clearly the large jar labeled "COOKIE JAR" in the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, one hand already in the jar, retrieving the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With his other hand, he's holding a plate, perhaps to collect his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, her arm raised in hopeful anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clearly waiting for her share, a silent accomplice in this sweet heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a clever operation they've got going on there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised at their stealth; the woman is right there and totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the boy is balancing, it looks like he's about to tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed, making it incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get caught, or worse, fall and hurt themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a certain thrill in watching their secret mission unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
